Screen fades to black as the man wakes up in a hospital. Instead of being 6”4 he finds himself stuck inside a 5”6 frame and he weighs 55kg. 
It takes the man a moment before he realizes all those sexy things didn’t happen. They where just dreams. That isn’t to say that all of those girls aren’t that hot. They are sexy af. However, they all joined that little white kids harem instead. The man had always been jealous of him because of how many women he got. The kid even managed to convince his mother and older sister to join in on the fun. So the man tried to beat him up.

It turns out the kid packs a meaner punch than it looks. He knocked the man out and sent him to the hospital. When the man was finally well enough to leave, he found his wife giving the kid head in his living room.

The end
